short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert local image file to base64 data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users can directly convert local pictures into base64 data through this extension, without running local commands or opening web pages with the same function. This extension can provide conversion services more conveniently
